summary: Updated all three page components to use the redesigned Header component with consistent styling matching the new design system. Changes include: (1) TasksPage.tsx - Updated description text to 'Manage and automate your Alma Analytics report exports.', added p-8 padding wrapper, increased button size to 'lg', removed redundant inner p-10 div. (2) Dashboard.tsx - Added description prop to Header, added p-8 padding wrapper, enhanced stat cards with themed background colors (bg-*-50/bg-*-900/30) and rounded-xl styling, updated text colors to use slate-500/slate-400 for consistency with design system, wrapped content in semantic sections. (3) LogsPage.tsx - Added description prop to Header, added p-8 padding wrapper, improved checkbox styling with proper focus ring and colors, updated all muted text colors to slate-500/slate-400 for dark mode support.
